trans-unit.source: Identifies the property system source of a particular dependency property value.
trans-unit.target: 識別特定相依性屬性值的屬性系統來源。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by a property within the <xref:System.Windows.ValueSource> structure, which in turn is obtained by calling a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyHelper.GetValueSource%2A> method against a particular dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 內的屬性會使用這個列舉<xref:System.Windows.ValueSource>結構，接著藉由呼叫取得<xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyHelper.GetValueSource%2A>針對特定的相依性屬性的方法。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyHelper.GetValueSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ValueSource>

trans-unit.source: Each value of this enumeration indicates that a particular aspect of the overall [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system was responsible for the effective value determination of a certain dependency property value on a specific dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉的每個值，指出特定方面的整體[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]屬性系統是負責進行有效的值決定的特定相依性物件上的特定相依性屬性值。

trans-unit.source: To learn more about the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system and the precedence at which each aspect of the property system operates, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要深入了解[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]屬性系統和優先順序的每個層面的屬性系統的運作情形，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The value Default is not the default value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 預設的值不是列舉型別的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Source is the default value, as defined by property metadata.
trans-unit.target: 來源是預設值所定義的屬性中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Source is from a setter in the default style.
trans-unit.target: 來源是來自預設樣式的 setter。

trans-unit.source: The default style comes from the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式來自於目前的主題。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Source is from a trigger in the default style.
trans-unit.target: 來源是來自預設樣式的觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: The default style comes from the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式來自於目前的主題。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Source is an implicit style reference (style was based on detected type or based type).
trans-unit.target: 來源是隱含樣式參考 （樣式根據偵測到的類型或基底類型）。

trans-unit.source: This value is only returned for the Style property itself, not for properties that are set through setters or triggers of such a style.
trans-unit.target: 此值才會傳回 Style 屬性本身，不會針對透過 setter 或觸發程序的這類樣式所設定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Source is a value through property value inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 來源是透過屬性值繼承的值。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Source is a locally set value.
trans-unit.target: 來源是本機設定值。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Source is based on a parent template being used by an element.
trans-unit.target: 來源根據項目正在使用父範本。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Source is a trigger-based value from a parent template that created the element.
trans-unit.target: 來源是觸發程序為基礎的值從父範本所建立的項目。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Source is from a style setter of a non-theme style.
trans-unit.target: 來源是來自非佈景主題樣式的樣式 setter。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Source is a trigger-based value of a non-theme style.
trans-unit.target: 非佈景主題樣式的觸發程序為基礎的值來源。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Source is a trigger-based value in a template that is from a non-theme style.
trans-unit.target: 來源是觸發程序為基礎的值是來自非佈景主題樣式範本中。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Source is not known.
trans-unit.target: 來源未知。

trans-unit.source: This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設值。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
